name: Pre-Registration
description: The account is currently being created.

name: Active
description: The account is active in our system. But some information is unverified.

name: Live
description: The account is active and live in our system. The Accountholder verified all information and can access the system.

name: Archived (Removed)
description: The account has been archived on our system and is no longer accessible through the API or UI.

name: Deactivated
description: The account has been deactivated. A deactivated account can be reinstated. While deactivated, all card transactions will fail.

name: Hold
description: The account has been placed on hold. The purpose of this status is to allow further review of KYC (Know-Your-Customer) submissions.

name: Underfunded
description: The account was funded, but due to recent purchases (debits), the account is below the minimum balance threshold.
